metadata.title: Cuisto - All Your Recipes in One Place
metadata.description: Turn TikToks, screenshots, and scattered links into your personal cookbook. AI-powered recipe extraction from any source.

problem.headline: Your recipes are
problem.subheadline: You've saved hundreds of amazing recipes. But when you're hungry and ready to cook, you can't find a single one.

scrollOfDoom.title: The Scroll of Doom
scrollOfDoom.description: You saw it on TikTok at 2am. You saved it. Now it's gone forever, buried under 500 other videos.

screenshotRoulette.title: Screenshot Roulette
screenshotRoulette.description: Your camera roll is a mess of recipes, memes, and receipts. Good luck finding that lasagna.

tabPurgatory.title: Tab Purgatory
tabPurgatory.description: 15 tabs open. 3 different apps. And you still can't remember where you saw that chicken recipe.

sendMeThatVoid.title: The 'Send Me That' Void
sendMeThatVoid.description: Your friend sent it on Instagram. Or was it iMessage? You'll never find it again.

howItWorks.headline: Three steps to
howItWorks.subheadline: From scattered links to organized cookbook in under 30 seconds.

capture.title: Capture
capture.subtitle: From anywhere
capture.description: Paste a TikTok link, drop a screenshot, or snap a photo of grandma's handwritten recipe. We accept it all.

extract.title: Extract
extract.subtitle: AI magic
extract.description: Our AI watches videos, reads images, and transcribes audio. In seconds, chaos becomes a structured recipe.

cook.title: Cook
cook.subtitle: With confidence
cook.description: Beautiful recipe cards with step-by-step instructions, built-in timers, and ingredient scaling. Finally, cooking without chaos.

features.headline: Built for the
features.subheadline: We stripped away the clutter, the ads, and the life stories. Just powerful tools to help you cook better.

universalImport.title: Universal Import
universalImport.description: TikToks, Reels, screenshots, or grandma's handwritten notes. If it's a recipe, we can read it.

cookingMode.title: Cooking Mode
cookingMode.description: No more unlocking your phone with floury hands. Screen stays on, timers are built-in.

spotifyOfFood.title: The Spotify of Food
spotifyOfFood.description: Organize recipes into collections. 'Weeknight Dinners', 'Date Night', 'Sunday Prep'.

makeItYours.title: Make It Yours
makeItYours.description: Scale ingredients, swap substitutes, and add your own notes. It's your cookbook now.

founder.headline: Why I'm building Cuisto
founder.name: Harry Viennot

story.paragraph1: Like you, I've saved hundreds of recipes across Instagram, TikTok, random websites, screenshots, and notes, most of which I never actually cooked because I simply forgot they existed.
story.paragraph2: I'd stand in my kitchen with no idea what to make, completely forgetting the dozens of dishes I already knew how to cook.
story.paragraph3: So I built Cuisto: one place where every recipe lives, organized and ready for when inspiration (or hunger) strikes.
